title: “Wouldn’t it be great to heal the world
body:

- Serj Tankian “Honking Antelope”

author: 5b5579b7fb6fc0396849f612

title: The past 7 days have been awesome in
body:
The past 7 days have been awesome in music. I know what my next album purchases are going to be.

“The Joy of Motion” by Animals as Leaders [Must hear: “Physical Education”]

“COPE” by Manchester Orchestra [Must hear: “Top Notch”]

Both been streamed and truly awesome. How can you not love music? I wish the world shared my enthusiasm sometimes but somethings are better enjoyed in solitude and I say, give me an empty room and all I ask is you give me a music player and access to my choice of music.

Also, festival season is coming soon. Gotta start saving, this summer has to be legendary. :D

Can’t wait.
author: 5b5579b7fb6fc0396849f612

title: I was at Vertigo Records today and I
body:
I was at Vertigo Records today and I haven't felt that at peace in a while

musicloversandfriends:

Danzig playing in the background, unlimited amounts of music I didn’t know yet and some I already knew.
author: 5b5579b7fb6fc0396849f612

title: Fuck The Grammy's. I need to vent.... I've
body:
Fuck The Grammy's. I need to vent.... I've lost all respect for the Grammy Awards

Link: Fuck The Grammy's. I need to vent.... I've lost all respect for the Grammy Awards

musicloversandfriends:

http://arts.nationalpost.com/2014/01/26/grammys-2014-the-full-list-of-winners-so-far/

Going through this list of winners again, I am very angry, hurt and confused. I wish I had someone to explain the thought process of the board of judges because I am very lost. I do not understand how a joke…

title: Who has a time machine, I wanna go
body: Who has a time machine, I wanna go to woodstock to see Jimi Hendrix in his prime
author: 5b5579b7fb6fc0396849f612

title: I haven't really lived up to the description
body: I haven't really lived up to the description of the blog lately. My apologies to myself and to any followers that actually looked to get some new music. I will start taking this more seriously and helping you discover more great music. Stay tuned.
author: 5b5579b7fb6fc0396849f612
